name: 95Visual
description: EST. In 2008, 95Visual is a Custom Tailored Web Application Dev firm located just outside of Los Angeles, CA. We are made up of hard working, dedicated and skilled professionals who create beautiful web applications and enjoy doing just that. We love being based just outside of Los Angeles because we know that we can do something unique to help local businesses thrive. We take pride in the fact that we can help businesses prosper in their community.
